summary:
Architecture and implementation plan for the Docling Pipeline.

Services:
- ingest-api: FastAPI endpoint for document submission
- docling-worker: Parses and normalizes documents
- embed-worker: Chunks text and generates embeddings
- ledger: Append-only JSONL with hash-chain integrity

Infra: Docker Compose orchestration with Redis (queues) and Qdrant (vectors).
